content.prompt: Expansionary monetary policy can affect the economy through which of the following chains of events?

choices.label: Increasing the discount rate lowers real interest rates, which raises investment.
Reducing taxes lowers the discount rate, which raises consumption.
Increasing government expenditures lowers nominal interest rates, which raises investment.
Increasing the reserve requirement lowers nominal interest rates, which increases investment.
Decreasing the administered interest rates lowers nominal interest rates, which increases investment.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
